name: Elevator Pitch (hugimugi7)
description:
Game about wasting your life.
  • You are a disgruntled employee at large AAA game studio Viral Videogames Inc. Everyday you spend countless hours wasting your life away in exchange for currency (without any overtime pay or benefits).                                
  • You’ve been staying late nights and weekends crunching just to ship out cash-grab games, all while Mr. CEO hides away in his ivory tower.                                             
  • Until one day, you just can’t take it anymore. Time to hitch a ride to the top floor and show The Boss who’s really boss.

          

It's finally time to release all of that built up anger
  • Flip tables and cause chaos like you always wanted to do!                                                        (╯°□°）╯︵ ┻━┻

______________________________

Controls 🎮:
  • Move:  Arrow keys
  • Take and hold object:  Hold space
  • Throw object:  Release space
  • Flip tables:  Shift
  • Toggle fullscreen:  F11
